attributes.action: Either cancel or lower grade boundaries for 2022 GCSE exams due to missed time
attributes.additional_details: To give the students a better chance at better grades and give them the same opportunity as any other year
attributes.background: Either cancel or lower the grade boundaries for the 2022 GCSE because the current year 10s have missed a year off school and would be unfair for them to do the GCSE’s normally

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
